mapper.select: SELECT caseinfo.caseid, sickerinfo.sickname, deptinfo.deptname, stafinfo.stafname, caseinfo.diagnosis, caseinfo.curescheme, caseinfo.curetime, caseinfo.casestate FROM caseinfo, sickerinfo, stafinfo, deptinfo WHERE caseinfo.sickid = sickerinfo.sickid AND caseinfo.stafid = stafinfo.stafid AND stafinfo.deptid = deptinfo.deptid AND sickerinfo.sickid = #{sickid}
